issue.title: [CF 1561] "Last Ability Used" cannot track Fracture/Shear on Vengeance Demonhunter
issue.body:
Hi first,

 

i would like to report a problem with the "Last Ability used" Condition. It has problems to track Fracture/Shear correctly. If I use this spell, the icon will be shown for a split second, maybe 0.2, and then it goes hidden. Im only pressing the Fracture button once and then nothing else.

I have tracked all possible Fracture ID´´ s that i could find and this is my icon. I´ m using TMW 8.5.3.

 

^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLASTCAST ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S< ^SName^S263642 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SLASTCAST ^SName^S209795 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^N3^T ^SType^SLASTCAST ^SName^S225919 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^N4^T ^SType^SLASTCAST ^SName^S225921 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^N5^T ^SType^SLASTCAST ^SName^S203782 ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N5 ^t^SName^S263642 ^SCooldownCheck^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^SAlpha^N0 ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^SRangeCheck^B ^t^N85301^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

 

I hope that it is possible to fix it.

Regards

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1561 | Raw
